trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Worcester
There were no other sightings in Worcester on or around March 31st 2003
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was leaving some store or place like that and as i went outside i happened to have something compell me to look up in the sky..as i did i happened to see the "plane" coming in like an airliner landing but if leveled off and banked to the right and slowed a little incoming.after it leveled off it was directly overhead where i could see a distinct outline..with three lights..pale amber colored..one at the tip of the nose and two at the wing tips..it had to be at least small airliner size..like a 727.no sound..very low.thought it was an sr-71 but i knew those arent flying anymore.it then flew at a good clip twards the framingham correctional from the licoln street worcester area..very fast twards the horizon and disappeared.i was shocked and amazed about the shape..only saw something close in a ufo book.didnt think id see one for real.a little anxious\nervous..
Summary: close to a sr-71 or spaceshuttle with short wings molded as part of body
